social_work: Core Member, FOSSC (Free and Open Source Software Community) - Collaborated with colleagues and engaged with a community of 150+ members. Mentored 10+ junior members, guiding them to contribute to open-source platforms.

projects.name: Play-Ground: E-commerce Video Game Store
projects.description: Developed and deployed a dynamic e-commerce platform using Python and Django, featuring integrated Stripe payment processing. Integrated secure payment processing through the Stripe API, ensuring reliable transactions and fostering trust. Implemented advanced product search and filtering functionalities for enhanced user experience. Designed comprehensive product pages with interactive features, including user reviews and ratings.

projects.name: ChatGPT Clone
projects.description: Led the development of a ChatGPT clone utilizing Django and JavaScript, integrating the OpenAI API, used fine-tuned API for personalized results. Integrated ChatGPTs API seamlessly into the platform, empowering users to receive contextually relevant responses in real-time. Implemented robust user authentication and chat storage functionalities, ensuring data privacy and security, implemented JWT for authentication, PostgreSQL for database management.

projects.name: Customer Relationship Management (CRM) App
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive CRM app for businesses, facilitating customer management, product listing, order tracking, and delivery management using Django as the backend. Enhanced data accessibility and usability with efficient CRUD operations. Integrated order management system, allowing sellers to easily track and manage delivered and undelivered orders.

experiences.description: Contributed in a project for developing highly interactive ChatGPT-based application, integrating the OpenAI API tailored for a specific institution, resulting in an 80% improvement in desired responses. Utilized Python, Django, JavaScript, HTML, and AWS to ensure scalability, robustness, and deployment of the project. Designed and implemented data extraction and automation script using Selenium and Django, reducing manual work by 90% and enhancing testing efficiency by 60%.

full_output.name: OM GUPTA
